title: Kratax Tactical LED Flashlights-UV Black Light&Pocket Knife-Tactical Knife-Super Bright 750 High Lumens-Good for Camping,Hiking, Mens Gift
features: 【Multitool Tactical Knife】:Our tactical Pocket knife is very durable and sharp,fits well in hands.It's suitable for outdoor activity, like camping, picnic, fishing,this EDC knife can also apply to seat belt cutter,knife, saw.The build-in safe-lock design can prevent the blade accidentally closing while using ,so it's safe for your fingers.

【2 in 1,4 Modes Tactical Flashlights】:LED tactical flashlight is a combination of white and UV light,which can be used for lighting or object detection.UV light can easily find pet stains,detect fungi in food,check banknotes.In addition, depending on the situation,you can easily and quickly switch between the four lighting modes using the power switch.High brightness, medium brightness,Strobe,UV.

【 Scaling Design Light】:Our 2in1 handheld flashlight is zoomable, can adjust and control the field of view.By rotating the product body, circular floodlights are selected and used for large area lighting. Or use a glare spotlight for long-distance observation.

【Portable Design】:Both the waterproof flashlight and picnic knife come with pen clip design, so you can hook it in your pocket or backpack, portable for carry. Applicable for everyday use, for example: camping, hiking, night fishing. You can push the lock design to the left when folding the tactical knife.

【Warm Tips】：The IPX6 waterproof flashlight can be used in wet or light rain. Do not put the UV flashlight directly into water or other liquids; need 3 AAA batteries(include).Please ensure the blade fully locked before using(Hearing a crisp sound when open)
description: This powerful flashlight is practical for any occasion, the pocket tactical knife is the gold partner of the LED light ,both the flashlights and knife are compact enough to fit in your backpack, survival bag, or car glove compartment.
(1)2 in 1 flashlights:LED light,UV light,meet your different requires
3 X AAA batteries used in series(batteries included);
(3)Zoom-able designed:ZOOM-IN or OUT to get the right focus:Max Beam 1150 feet
（4）4 practical Modes: High, Medium, Strobe emergency,UV;

The blade material of the pocket knife is 3Cr13 steel, the hardness after heat treatment can reach 55 ± 3HRC. The handle material is aluminum,the surface is re-hardened. The knife adopts quick opening design, comfortable handle, fine workmanship, wear resistance and rust prevention.
EDC, Power Outages, Emergency, Patrolling, Dog-Walking, Backup, Survival,Hiking,Hunting,Find pet stains,Detect fungi in food,Check banknotes.
(1)Please use 3pcs AAA batteries in series with the battery holder,18650battery should be used with sleeve;
(2) Please take out the battery if the flashlight won't be used for a long time;
(3)Please ensure the blade fully locked before using;
(4)Please keep the knife away from children.
Any concerns,please feel free to contact us or POST your question to the Q&A part.
